SELECT p.pname as product_name, p.bprice as bprice, p.dprice as delivery, p.discount as discount, (p.bprice * p.discount) as discount_price, p.bprice - (p.bprice * p.discount) as after_price, c.cartcnt as "개수", (p.bprice - (p.bprice * p.discount))*c.cartcnt + p.dprice as total, p.regId as admin, c.regid as user
FROM CART c JOIN PRODUCT p ON c.pnum = p.pnum WHERE c.regid = #{regid}
